official_title: A bill to amend certain provisions of law relating to the disposition of public lands in Mono County, California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits any public land conveyance to the city of Los Angeles, California, under a certain Act dated June 23, 1936, relating to public lands in Mono County, California.

titles.title: A bill to amend certain provisions of law relating to the disposition of public lands in Mono County, California, and for other purposes.
